channel.title: FM Trick or Treat(2/8)
channel.description:
# Trick or Treat?
**** ### Gameplay
Prob Suggesstions will last for 10 hours Prob mission will last for 24 hours or untill all players pm in their action **** ### Useful Keywords **/prob**(**players**) to prob a team of players to go on a mission. **/acc -** to accept a mission **/rej** - to reject a mission **/skip**(**playername**) - if you have the ability to probe you instead give it to another player **/go** - to simply "go on" the mission, pm to host. **/trk** - to trick a mission, to pm to host. ****
At the beginning of the game, the first player(on the playerlist) will do a team proposal selecting 3 players (**/prob** (players), this will move onto the second half of the day phase, players have 10 hours to either accept or reject the mission either doing **/acc** or **/rej**, if majority refuse the team, the next player down will prob a team. If accepted it will move onto the "Trick or treat Phase". The Next voting phase the next player down from the one who's team proposal was accepted will first propose. If necessary a player can skip to a certain player by doing **/skip (playername)**
**Trick or Treat Phase** After the team proposal, each player on the proposed team must secretly preform an action, treaters can only **go on** the mission, while trickers can either **go on(/go)** or **Trick(/Trk)** the mission. The treaters mission is successful if no players trick it, while it fails if 1 or more players trick it(unless it is a teacher's house which is explained on the probe list), note the amount of tricks preformed will be showed to all players. The phase last's 24 hours or until everyone pmes in their action, if a player doesn't pm their action, I will be forced to trick if they are evil, or go on if they are treaters. No Players Can talk during this phase
No Night phase :disappointed_relieved::disappointed_relieved::disappointed_relieved:
[details="Classes"]
# [color = "steblue"] The Street Watcher [/color] **[color = "steblue"] Treater Special [/color]** **On duty** - Just before halloween, you are on the streets, making sure everyone is safe, you have witnessed some of the tricks preformed first hand. You will know who all the evils are except for the hag. *Successfully be able to secure 3 missions.*
# [color = "steblue"] The Chief [/color] **[color = "steblue"] Treater Support [/color]** **Protective** - You will know who the Hag is and who the Watch Man is, your job is to deflect any attention to the Watch man and try and found out which of the watchman are real *Successfully be able to secure 3 missions.*
# [color = "#FFA500"] The Teenager [/color] **[color = "#FFA500"] Tricker Special [/color]** **Egging** - At the end of the game if treaters manage to secure 3 missions, the teenager can choose a player by doing **/egg (player)** if they successfully get the town watch man trickers win anyway - 1 use *Be able to trick 3 missions*
# [color = "#FFA500"] The Hag [/color] **[color = "#FFA500"] Tricker Special [/color]** **Old Clothes** - You are a homeless women dressed up in any old fashioned gear you can find making you look like the town watchman, your job is to confuse the chief into believing you are the real watchman. *Be able to trick 3 missions*
# [color = "#FFA500"] The Bully [/color] **[color = "#FFA500"] Tricker Offensive [/color]** **Bully!** - You are a normal bully nothing special...Go get a life... *Be able to trick 3 missions* [/details]
Like blue dragon and unseen/cult, the treaters are an uniformed majority while trickers are an informed minority, who know who each tricker is.
# Player List > **[color = "orange"] Bully [/color]** > **[color = "orange"] Hag [/color]** > **[color = "orange"] Teenager[/color]** > **[color = "steblue"] Street Watcher [/color]** > **[color = "steblue"] The Chief [/color]** > **[color = "steblue"] The Treater[/color]** > **[color = "steblue"] The Treater[/color]** > **[color = "steblue"] The Treater[/color]**
# Probe Players **(Amount of players selected to go on a mission every probe)** *** **Mission 1:3 Players** **Mission 2:4 Players** **Mission 3:4 Players** **Mission 4:5 Players(Teachers)** - two players need to trick in this round in order for it to be tricked. **Mission 5:5 Players** **** # Players:
1.GamerPoke 2.Lightsin 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8.
Backups:
**Starts** [date=2018-12-11 time=16:20:00 timezone="Europe/London"]
